pr_title: Suppress checkstyle javadoc check from non-main source sets.

timeline.message: Suppress checkstyle javadoc check from non-main source sets.

timeline.bodyText: I think internal is fine to have it
timeline.author: bogdandrutu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE suppressions PUBLIC
+  "-//Checkstyle//DTD SuppressionFilter Configuration 1.2//EN"
+  "https://checkstyle.org/dtds/suppressions_1_2.dtd">
+
+<suppressions>
+  <!-- Suppress Javadoc-related checks in non-public code. -->
+  <suppress checks="JavadocParagraph|JavadocMethod" files="[\\/](internal|jmh|test)[\\/]" />
